docs.snippet: The Pacers were the deeper, more composed team, spreading out the scoring with six players in double figures in upending the defending champion Heat in Game 1....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pacers were the deeper, more composed team, spreading out the scoring with six players in double figures in upending the defending champion Heat in Game 1.
docs.abstract: Indiana Pacers beat Miami Heat, 107-96, in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals.

headline.main: Composed Pacers Muscle Past the Heat
headline.print_headline: With Composure, Pacers Muscle Past Heat

docs.snippet: The legend of Kawhi Leonard’s hands has grown along with his role as a do-everything swingman for the Spurs, who will host the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: The legend of Kawhi Leonard’s hands has grown along with his role as a do-everything swingman for the Spurs, who will host the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs swingman Kawhi Leonard has developed a reputation for unusual dexterity with his surprisingly large hands, which measure 11.25 inches from thumb to pinkie; Kawhi's prowess will be key factor as team prepares to take on the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals.

headline.seo: Kawhi Leonard Puts His Frisbee-Size Hands to Work for the Spurs

docs.snippet: LeBron James has willingly injected himself into the controversy over Donald Sterling’s ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers....
docs.lead_paragraph: LeBron James has willingly injected himself into the controversy over Donald Sterling’s ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports Of The Times column praises Miami Heat star LeBron James for embracing his leadership role, condemning bigotry of Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling and paving way for a more open dialog on issue; calls for an alliance of players, coaches, owners and the commissioner to oust Sterling as owner.

headline.main: N.B.A.’s On-Court Leader Embraces Off-Court Mantle Without Fear
